round_best: Develop an automated, continuous monitoring system that uses machine learning to dynamically adapt and refine a diverse dataset of counterfactuals. This system will leverage active learning to identify and prioritize the generation of new counterfactuals where the model's performance indicates high uncertainty or potential bias. By continuously updating the dataset and model evaluations, this approach can effectively scale with the increasing size and complexity of LLMs while ensuring more robust and up-to-date bias assessments.
